creator: alf@i100.no
text:
If you want to have details about the subsamples of TransactionController, then
you should add a SimpleController inside the TransactionController, and then add
the samplers inside the SimpleController. And any listener inside the
SimpleController will see the subsamples.

At the TransactionController level and higher up, we do not want both the
transaction sample and each individual sample appear, because then the each
subsample will be "analyzed" twice.

So I condiser this as "works as designed".

Likewise, subsamples are not stored in CSV files for HTTP Samplers with 
embedded resources. The parent sample time is the sum of the times of the 
parent page and the child resources. [One difference here is that the parent 
page time is not shown separately]

Subsamples can be shown in XML format files.
